Contact Gulf Sothebys International Realty today for your private viewing of this extraordinary property."]

descriptions:
['DescriptionExclusive Links Real Estate in Dubai are proud to offer this stunning 2 Bedroom apartment for sale in Marina Gate 1, Dubai Marina.
The apartment has a unique & contemporary finish & floor to ceiling windows to maximize light. The rooms are well proportioned with good outdoor balcony space for enjoyment & entertainment & all apartments are fitted with integrated oven & hob, integrated fridge freezer & washer/dryer.
	Infinity pool with temperature control
	Children’s pool area
	Spectacular dual level gymnasium overlooking the marina
	Illuminated squash & paddle tennis courts
	8 high-speed elevators
	Direct access loading dock for hassle-free moving in
	Dedicated security with integrated CCTV coverage
	24 hours concierge services
Marina Gate is ideally located next to Marina Walk with many amenities close by & within easy walking distance to Dubai Marina Metro Station and the newly operating Dubai Tram.It is undoubtedly the most enviable and best location within the Dubai Marina
Our Dubai Marina Retail shop is open 7 days a week and come on by – located in Marina Gate 1
For more info and to arrange a viewing please contact James']
